thread.title: 'O.J.: Made in America' Oscar winner Ezra Edelman dedicates award to victims of police brutality
thread.title_full: 'O.J.: Made in America' Oscar winner Ezra Edelman dedicates award to victims of police brutality | Washington Examiner

author: Kyle Feldscher
title: 'O.J.: Made in America' Oscar winner Ezra Edelman dedicates award to victims of police brutality
text:
The winner for feature documentary dedicated his award to all victims of police violence in accepting his win for "O.J. Made in America."
After dedicating the award to Nicole Brown Simpson and Ronald Goldman, who were killed in the incident for which O.J. Simpson was acquitted, Ezra Edelman got political.
"It is also for others, the victims of police violence, police brutality, racially motivated violence and criminal injustice," he said. "This is their story, as well as Ron and Nicole's."
